name: time
summary: The `<time>` HTML element represents a specific period in time. It may include the `datetime` attribute to translate dates into machine-readable format, allowing for better search engine results or custom features such as reminders.
contentCategories: Flow content, phrasing content, palpable content.
permittedParents: Any element that accepts phrasing content.

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.summary: This attribute indicates the time and/or date of the element and must be in one of the formats described below.
